sentences.en: Did the little Piggy really cry'Wee'all the way home?
sentences.cn: 难道猪小弟真的叫一声[Wee]都回家的路上?

sentences.en: He just needs to calm down a wee bit.
sentences.cn: 他只是需要稍微冷静一下。

sentences.en: He returned in the wee small hours.
He said he wanted to wee.
I came to see whether you could supply me with a wee bit of brains.
sentences.cn: 我来这儿是想问您能不能给我一点智慧.

sentences.en: I lay awake through the wee small hours, waiting for the signal.
sentences.cn: 我躺到后半夜没睡, 等候信号.

sentences.en: I put him on his pot, he did some wee.
sentences.cn: 我把他放到便壶上，他撒了点尿。

sentences.en: I'll have a wee drop of cream in my coffee.
sentences.cn: 我要在咖啡里放一丁点儿奶油.

sentences.en: I've got a wee kitten in the flat.
sentences.cn: 我在公寓里养了一只小猫。

sentences.en: Just a wee drop of milk for me.
Leisure is not something sandwiched into the wee hours after an exhausting day.
sentences.cn: 所谓空闲并不是可以挤在忙了一整天后的三更半夜的东西.

sentences.en: She goes to Wee's office and see if she needed anything.
sentences.cn: 她去Wee的 办公室看看Wee是否需要帮助.

sentences.en: The baby has done a wee in his potty.
We'll be a wee bit late, I'm afraid.

trans.tran_en: very small – used especially in Scottish English
